news.headline: Robert Seidel steps down as CEO after 12 years at Alerion Aviation, to take on role as Chairman. Daniel Ramirez to succeed.
news.summary: In West Palm Beach, Florida, on February 5, 2025, Alerion Aviation revealed that Robert Seidel will be resigning from his role as Chief Executive Officer following a successful twelve-year tenure. His position will be assumed by Daniel Ramirez. Seidel played a vital role in driving the company's expansion and success during his time as CEO.

news.headline: "Christmas Tree of Kindness debuting at 2025 NYC Toy Fair, inspiring kindness with storybook, craft activity, app #ToyFairLife"
news.summary: Christmas Tree of Kindness, Inc. will be featured at the 2025 NYC Toy Fair from March 1-4 at the Javitz Center. The event, #ToyFairLife, will be held in New York City.

news.headline: ACR Poker introduces Team Online Championships Home Game on Feb 6 to play with members and win cash.
news.summary: Join in weekly games with members of the popular ACR Team Online for a chance to secure a spot in a special cash game with them. The exciting initiative by ACR Poker gives players the chance to compete against their favorite team members regularly. This opportunity comes as the company kicks off the program on February 5, 2025, in San Jose, Costa Rica. Join now to play with the ACR Team Online and win your way into an exclusive cash game with them.

news.headline: León Y Sol Tequila partners with Bay Area's Back of the House, Inc., in a move to boost presence in hospitality.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in San Francisco, León Y Sol Tequila, a rapidly growing brand in the premium tequila market, announced a significant collaboration in the Bay Area's hospitality industry. The company is joining forces with Back of the House, Inc., a renowned restaurant group known for operating several highly popular dining establishments in the region. This strategic partnership is poised to bring innovative experiences to consumers in the area and further bolster the presence of both entities in the market.

news.headline: Porte Brown wins Client Service Excellence Award for fourth year. This Chicagoland firm offers accounting, audit, tax, tech, and wealth services.
news.summary: Today, Elk Grove Village, Illinois-based firm Porte Brown LLC, known for offering a wide range of services including accounting, audit, tax, technology, and wealth management, has been awarded the prestigious Best of Accounting Award. This award signifies their excellence in delivering top-notch services to their clients. Established in 2025, Porte Brown LLC has quickly become a renowned name in the Chicagoland area. More information about their services can be found on their website www.portebrown.com.

news.headline: Tortally Therapeutics, LLC in Md redefining mental health care with client-centered approach since June 2023.
news.summary: In Glen Burnie, Maryland on February 5, 2025, Tortally Therapeutics, LLC, a Maryland-based psychotherapy and counseling practice, has shared its dedication to providing client-focused mental health services amidst a competitive landscape. Established in June 2023, the practice aims to offer unique services to its clients.

news.headline: National Hardware Show in Las Vegas introduces NHS Influencer Summit for exclusive access, immersive experiences, and networking. Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: Announcing The NHS Influencer Summit: Offering Unique Access, Engaging Experiences, and Genuine Networking Opportunities LAS VEGAS, February 5, 2025 - The National Hardware Show (NHS) is excited to introduce The NHS Influencer Summit. This exclusive event caters to the home improvement and hardware sector, bringing together industry professionals for a one-of-a-kind experience. Expect immersive activities, valuable networking connections, and insider access to cutting-edge trends.

news.headline: NettyWorth launches NettyScore, a Web3 credit score, for decentralized lending. Revolutionizing loan protocols with AI.
news.summary: In San Francisco on February 5, 2025, NettyWorth, a platform utilizing artificial intelligence for loans secured by NFTs and Real-World Assets (RWAs), has unveiled NettyScore. This new feature is a cutting-edge credit assessment system implemented within the Web3 framework. It reviews borrowers' loan activities on blockchain, such as repayments, to evaluate creditworthiness in a decentralized manner.

news.headline: NFL Hall of Famer Jerome Bettis partners with CDC Foundation to raise awareness on hypertension's impact on Black adults, a leading cause of cardiovascular deaths.
news.summary: In recent news from Atlanta on February 5, 2025, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) revealed that uncontrolled hypertension stands out as a top reason behind cardiovascular disease-related fatalities. Shockingly, a significant number of individuals remain unaware of their elevated blood pressure levels due to the condition often being asymptomatic. This highlights the urgent need for greater awareness and proactive health monitoring to combat this prevalent issue.

news.headline: Nordic wins 2025 Best in KLAS award for Clinical Optimization marking its 15th anniversary.
news.summary: In Madison, Wisconsin on February 5, 2025, Nordic®, an international consulting company specializing in health and technology, was recognized with a Best in KLAS award for Clinical Optimization in the latest 2025 Best in KLAS Awards - Software and Services report. This prestigious designation is based on feedback collected from customers and stakeholders in the industry. The report highlights Nordic®'s top-ranking performance in the field of Clinical Optimization, solidifying its position as a leader in the industry for offering outstanding services.

news.headline: Leverage with Media PR appoints Kayce Brown as Head of Strategic Partnerships & Brand Integrations. #PRNewswire #NewYork
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in New York City, Leverage with Media PR, a leading agency with top clients like Olympic gold medalist Kurt Angle and biohacker Dave Asprey, has appointed Kayce Brown as the new Head of Strategic Partnerships and Brand.

news.headline: Oral care brand quip launches professional grade sonic toothbrush: quip Ultra Next Generation Smart Sonic Toothbrush.
news.summary: Introducing the groundbreaking quip Ultra Next Generation Smart Sonic Toothbrush, unveiled in New York on February 5, 2025. Created by the design-led oral wellness company, quip, this innovative product boasts cutting-edge features for improved dental care. This smart toothbrush combines advanced technology with sleek design, promising a new level of oral hygiene. Stay tuned for more details on this revolutionary device.

news.headline: Bitcoin expected to reach $500,000 before Trump's exit, says Standard Chartered, nearing gold's market cap.
news.summary: Standard Chartered anticipates that under the leadership of Donald Trump, the value of Bitcoin will surge to $500,000, potentially nearing the market capitalization of gold.

news.headline: IMAX breaks record with $53M in Chinese New Year box office, exceeding previous record by 57% with 5.5M admissions.
news.summary: IMAX Corporation (NYSE: IMAX) has broken its box office record for Chinese New Year, generating an impressive $53 million in revenue over the 7-day holiday period ending on February 4. The 2025 Chinese New Year holiday marked the peak moviegoing period in China, with IMAX surpassing its previous record of $34 million set in 2023 by an impressive 57%. Additionally, IMAX achieved its highest-ever attendance for Chinese New Year, recording 5.5 million admissions across the country. This success underscores IMAX's significant growth and popularity within the Chinese market during key festive seasons.

news.headline: Riverbed launches Smart OTel, a game changer in OpenTelemetry integration, promising advancements in data monitoring.
news.summary: Riverbed, headquartered in Redwood City, California, has recently introduced Smart OTel, a revolutionary development in the field of OpenTelemetry. This innovation is set to transform the way data is collected and analyzed, ushering in a new era of efficiency and effectiveness.

news.headline: Actelis Networks appoints Dr. Niel Ransom to Board of Directors amidst infrastructure defense demand surge. #ASNS
news.summary: In a recent announcement, Actelis Networks* (NASDAQ: ASNS) has named Dr. Niel Ransom to its Board of Directors. With a wealth of experience spanning nearly 50 years in networking, cybersecurity, and deep-tech investment, Ransom's appointment brings valuable expertise to the company. This move comes as Actelis witnesses a growing demand for secure and high-performance networks. The appointment closely follows Actelis' introduction of MetaShield, an AI-driven cybersecurity product aimed at safeguarding critical networks.

news.headline: Cantaloupe, Inc. partners with Fundbox to create Cantaloupe Capital, providing small business financing for equipment and cash flow.
news.summary: A collaboration between Cantaloupe, Inc. and Fundbox has led to the launch of Cantaloupe Capital, a financing platform focused on supporting small businesses with equipment and cash flow needs. The platform aims to provide crucial financial assistance to small businesses by offering them access to funding. This collaboration is part of Cantaloupe, Inc.'s strategic efforts to cater to the financial requirements of small businesses.

news.headline: Provana strengthens dispute solutions by acquiring Palinode, enhancing credit dispute management for financial institutions.
news.summary: In Lisle, Illinois, Provana, a prominent provider of tech-enabled services for financial and receivables management, has revealed the acquisition of Palinode, a renowned leader in credit dispute management solutions for financial institutions. This acquisition aims to bolster credit dispute investigation and resolution capabilities, ultimately providing great value to customers. The acquisition brings in Palinode's Sonnet product, identified as a robust solution that aligns perfectly with Provana's core mission. This strategic move is set to improve services for clients and expand the prowess of Provana in the sector.

news.headline: Inovalon's Pharmacy Surveillance Software wins Best in KLAS for 8th year, highlighting its role in patient safety.
news.summary: Software from Inovalon has been awarded Best In KLAS for the 8th consecutive year in Bowie, Maryland. The Pharmacy Surveillance Software is recognized for its role in ensuring patient safety.

news.headline: Wedbush Securities introduces Real-Time Automated Locate Service for easy-to-borrow and hard-to-borrow securities. Great news for brokers.
news.summary: Los Angeles-based Wedbush Securities, a top financial services and investment company, has introduced a new service for quick and effective access to easy-to-borrow and hard-to-borrow securities. This initiative aims to streamline the short-selling process for clients, providing a comprehensive solution for broker-dealer correspondents to enhance their operations. The state-of-the-art automated locate system by Wedbush promises efficiency and support for correspondents conducting short-selling activities.

news.headline: Financial firms optimistic about growth, plan to increase software budgets; 70% regret recent tech purchase.
news.summary: A recent study by Capterra in Arlington, Virginia revealed that a majority of financial companies are looking to boost their software budgets in the near future. However, the research also indicated that 70% of these firms have experienced remorse over a recent technology acquisition.

news.headline: Trade tensions could impact Apple as Beijing considers investigating the iPhone maker amid President Trump's tariff threat.
news.summary: Reports indicate that Beijing is considering launching an investigation into the company responsible for producing the iPhone, highlighting China's potential strategies in response to President Trump's tariff warning. This move reflects the increasing tensions between the two nations, as China evaluates its options amid the trade dispute.

news.headline: Qlik Connect 2025 focuses on AI certification and real results, highlighting modern data strategies and automation.
news.summary: In Philadelphia, Qlik revealed significant details for Qlik Connect 2025, highlighting key themes such as modern data strategies, AI integration, and automation. The event aims to address vital industry topics and trends to shape the future of data analytics.

news.headline: Moveworks launches Quick GPT, integrating it into its AI Assistant to help employees streamline tasks while ensuring security.
news.summary: In Mountain View, California, Moveworks has introduced Quick GPT to its agentic AI Assistant, a tool that enables employees to enhance productivity by accessing answers, automating tasks, and other functions. The new feature, Quick GPT, leverages LLMs to boost efficiency within the company while maintaining enterprise security standards. This addition serves various teams and enhances productivity use cases, ultimately improving overall efficiency.

news.headline: Veracyte's Decipher Bladder Test predicts disease upstaging in patients with bladder cancer, according to a new study. #VCYT
news.summary: A recent study conducted in South San Francisco revealed that Veracyte’s Decipher Bladder Test has shown promise in predicting disease upstaging in patients dealing with bladder cancer. This breakthrough finding demonstrates the test's potential to accurately identify the likelihood of disease progression in affected individuals. The study's results emphasize the importance of utilizing Veracyte’s innovative test, as it can significantly impact patient care and treatment strategies. This development marks a significant advancement in the field, providing hope for improved outcomes for individuals battling bladder cancer.

news.headline: Sampo's Board of Directors approved a share split.
Seoul National University researchers enhance Li-ion battery performance by modifying cathodes, boosting lifespan, stability, and energy density.
news.summary: A team of researchers in Seoul, South Korea led by Prof. Dongwook Han has made significant advancements in lithium-ion battery technology. By modifying LNMO cathodes, they have improved the lifespan, stability, and energy density of Li-ion batteries. This breakthrough is crucial in enhancing battery performance. The modifications have resulted in a substantial increase in battery lifespan, stability, and energy density. This development marks a significant step forward in the field of battery technology, with the potential to revolutionize energy storage. The research team's work is poised to have a lasting impact on the industry.

news.headline: Consensus partners with Highspot, enhancing sales enablement with new integrations. Leading products unify for better initiatives.
news.summary: Atlanta-based company Consensus, the top enterprise Product Experience Platform, recently revealed a partnership with Highspot, the sole unified sales enablement platform offering a system of record for go-to-market strategies. This new collaboration brings enhanced functionalities to a wide range of businesses.

news.headline: mr.Booster to present digital marketing solutions at SIGMA Dubai 2025. Full-service agency specializing in data-driven strategies.
news.summary: In Dubai, UAE, on February 5, 2025, mr.Booster, a prominent marketing agency offering comprehensive digital marketing services, revealed its involvement in SIGMA Dubai 2025. The agency will present its cutting-edge, data-centric solutions at the event.

news.headline: Engenuity Systems sponsors Smarter Summit 2025 showcasing open-source smart building tech at AHR Expo.
news.summary: Cutting-edge leadership in open-source smart building technologies was showcased at the AHR Expo in Orlando, Florida on February 5, 2025. Engenuity Systems, a prominent player in the smart building sector, sponsored and took part in the renowned Smarter Summit 2025. The event drew significant interest from industry experts, with attendance exceeding over 500 professionals and featuring over 50 exhibitors.

news.headline: Val Chmerkovskiy and Jenna Johnson from DWTS to co-host 12th Annual MUAHS Awards in Hollywood.
news.summary: In Hollywood, California on February 5, 2025, it was announced that Val Chmerkovskiy and Jenna Johnson, renowned Mirror Ball champions from "Dancing With the Stars" and a married couple, have been selected to co-host the 12th Annual Make-Up Artists & Hair Stylists Guild Awards. The event will celebrate the talents of makeup artists and hair stylists in the industry.

news.headline: Diamond Properties marks 30 years of success with 1.4M sq ft added, 2024 acquisitions, and ShopRite opening at 333 N Bedford Rd.
news.summary: Celebrating its 30th anniversary, Diamond Properties in Mount Kisco, New York commemorates three thriving decades. During this period, the company added an impressive 1.4 million square feet through successful strategic investments and innovative approaches to retail development.

news.headline: Simple Interact wins 2025 Best in KLAS Award for patient intake management, praised for customizability, EMR integration.
news.summary: Recognized for its emphasis on customizability, EMR integration, user experience, and customer support, Simple Interact, a healthcare front office automation platform based in Dallas, has been ranked as the top patient intake management solution provider. This acknowledgment was given on February 5, 2025, marking a significant achievement for the company. Simple Interact's commitment to these key areas has propelled them to #1 in the industry.

news.headline: Finnish company Denssi partners with UAE-based ANDS for distributing premium nicotine pouches in Middle East, strengthening their mission.
news.summary: On February 5th, 2025, a collaboration was revealed between Denssi, a prominent Finnish producer of high-quality nicotine pouches, and ANDS, an emerging distributor of advanced nicotine products based in the UAE. This partnership further solidifies their joint commitment to revolutionizing the industry.

news.headline: US Treasury Quarterly Refunding
Celebrate Valentine's Day with MAGA Red No. 47 & MAGA Dark Red No. 47 lipsticks by Go Red Cosmetics in Fullerton.
news.summary: Embrace feelings of love, patriotism, and elegance with the introduction of MAGA Red No. 47 and MAGA Dark Red No. 47 Lipsticks by Go Red Cosmetics, based in Fullerton, California. This Valentine's Day will witness the debut of these striking lip colors, providing an opportunity to showcase bold patriotism.

news.headline: MAXISIQ chosen as an awardee for GSA's OASIS+ contracts, a milestone in federal professional services acquisition.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Round Rock, Texas, MAXISIQ was revealed as one of the awardees for the General Services Administration's OASIS+ Unrestricted and Small Business contract vehicles. This is a significant achievement in the federal government's procurement of professional services. This selection positions MAXISIQ to offer its services to various government agencies through these contract vehicles, facilitating access to a wide range of professional services. MAXISIQ's success in securing this contract underscores its expertise and competitiveness in the federal marketplace. The company is now poised to leverage this opportunity to expand its reach and impact in the government sector, contributing to its growth and success in serving federal clients.

news.headline: Caddington Limited uses AI to identify top investments in 24 leading AI innovations, revolutionizing investment strategy.
news.summary: In Aldrich Bay, Hong Kong, on February 5, 2025, Caddington Limited, a leading investment company known for its use of innovative technology, has revealed its latest move in using Artificial Intelligence (AI) to detect and seize upon the most advantageous opportunities. This marks a significant step in the firm's commitment to staying ahead in the market.

news.headline: Correction: Annual report for 2024.

Contact Center Software Market to reach $109.7 billion by 2028 with a 21.2% CAGR, led by NICE, IBM, and Genesys.ращContact centers transitioning to cloud solutions drive market growth with key opportunities in AI and automation.
news.summary: The Contact Center Software Market is expected to reach USD 109.7 billion by 2028, growing at a CAGR of 21.2% from USD 41.9 billion in 2023. Factors driving this growth include the rise in cloud-based solutions, integration with CRM, and demand for personalized interactions. Key companies in this market include NICE, IBM, Genesys, AWS, among others. The solutions segment leads the market, with omnichannel routing being the top solution. Opportunities in the market include analyzing audio/video conversations, AI, and automation. Restraints include network bandwidth issues and high costs of PRI phone services. The full report can be found on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Datassential expands global menu data to Big 5 markets in Europe, including France, Germany, Italy, Spain, and the U.K.
news.summary: Datassential, a prominent food and beverage intelligence platform, has extended its advanced global sales intelligence solution to cover menu and limited-time offer (LTO) monitoring in Europe’s major markets - France, Germany, Italy, Spain, and the U.K. This expansion consolidates Datassential’s reputation as the leading source for empowering the foodservice industry. The platform now offers comprehensive insights into consumer trends and industry developments, catering to a wider audience and providing valuable data to businesses in the food and beverage sector across Europe's primary markets.

news.headline: US December capital goods import $83.76 bln vs November imports $82.49 bln
US 2024 trade deficit $918.42 bln vs 2023 deficit $784.89 bln
Overland Advantage and Wells Fargo lead senior secured credit facilities to FFF Enterprises, Inc. Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: Today, a business development company called Overland Advantage in New York disclosed that it operated as the main leader. This company utilizes a unique direct lending strategy and is boosted by a close collaboration between Centerbridge Partners and Wells Fargo. The announcement was made on February 5, 2025.

news.headline: Data center capex set to exceed $1 trillion by 2029 per Dell'Oro Group, with AI infrastructure spending on a strong growth path.
news.summary: Redwood City, California - As of February 5, 2025, the AI infrastructure spending is experiencing significant growth momentum, according to a recent report by Dell'Oro Group. This organization is recognized for providing market insights on telecommunications, networks, and data center industries. The report highlights a robust increase in investments in AI infrastructure. The precise figures and statistics detailing this growth were not disclosed.

news.headline: Cboe appoints Meaghan Dugan as Head of U.S. Options, part of ongoing expansion efforts in global derivatives team.
news.summary: Meaghan Dugan has been appointed to oversee the strategic advancement and expansion of Cboe's U.S. options business. This appointment comes in the midst of several recent additions to staff within Cboe's Global Derivatives division. The expansion efforts will encompass various aspects including business development, market intelligence, and sales teams across the U.S., Europe, and APAC regions. This move indicates Cboe's focus on enhancing its presence and capabilities within the derivatives market.

news.headline: EDPR NA DG finishes Bristol I community solar project in Maine, aiding 100s with bill savings and local investment.
news.summary: A recent project in Bristol, Maine completed by EDPR NA Distributed Generated LLC (EDPR NA DG) will result in substantial electric bill savings for hundreds of local residential subscribers. The investment in the Bristol area is aimed at benefiting the community. The project was finalized and energized on February 5, 2025.

news.headline: COA proposes legislative plan for health care reform to stabilize system, protect patients, and restore competition.
news.summary: In an effort to address the challenges in the U.S. healthcare system, the Community Oncology Alliance (COA) has presented Congress with a detailed plan. This roadmap aims to stabilize healthcare, safeguard patients, and promote competition within care delivery. Released on February 5, 2025, the COA Prescription for Health Care provides a comprehensive strategy for reform. This initiative serves as a guide for lawmakers to make impactful changes to the healthcare landscape, improve patient care, and ensure access to quality services.

news.headline: Acuity Behavioral Health to analyze BHAI impact on Yale New Haven Health's inpatient psychiatric operations. Study to assess clinical and operational impacts of patient acuity with BHAI model.
news.summary: A research study is set to evaluate the clinical and operational effects of accurately measuring patient acuity in inpatient psychiatric units using the BHAI (Behavioral Health Acuity Index) model. This study aims to analyze how various human factors influence nursing staff, with a focus on improving patient care. The study will involve examining the impact of precision measurement on patient outcomes and the workload of nursing staff. The results of the study are anticipated to provide valuable insights on the effectiveness of the BHAI model in enhancing care quality and efficiency in psychiatric units.

news.headline: United Parks & Resorts Inc. (NYSE: PRKS) to release Q4 & fiscal 2024 results on Feb 26, 2025 before market opens.
news.summary: Orlando, Florida - United Parks & Resorts Inc. (NYSE: PRKS) declared plans to unveil its financial performance for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 2024 on Wednesday, February 26, 2025. The report will be disclosed prior to the market opening.
